name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Skilled .NET Developer with expertise in **C#**, **.NET**, and **Entity Framework**, proficient in designing and implementing robust Web APIs. Strong understanding of **SQL Server**, multithreading, and async/await patterns, focusing on delivering high-performance solutions. Experienced in unit testing with **xUnit** and **NUnit**, and applying software development principles such as **SOLID**, Clean Code, and design patterns. Demonstrated ability to leverage **Dependency Injection** and **IoC** in application architecture. Familiar with **WinForms**, **Angular**, and advanced practices including **DDD** and **CQRS**. Committed to continuous integration and delivery using **Git** and CI/CD methodologies. With a background as a Full-Stack Software Engineer, I bring a strong foundation in scalable, reliable, and user-centric application design across diverse industries like healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed robust and efficient Web APIs using **C#** and **.NET** frameworks, adhering to software development principles and ensuring high performance in data management.
- Implemented multithreading and **async/await** patterns to enhance application responsiveness, achieving a reduction in processing times by **40%**.
- Utilized **Entity Framework** for seamless data access to **SQL Server**, improving database interaction and integrity through unit testing with **NUnit** and **xUnit**.
- Designed and integrated complex systems using **design patterns** such as **CQRS** and **DDD**, ensuring maintainability and scalability of applications.
- Leveraged **Dependency Injection** and **IoC** to decouple application components, promoting clean architecture and enhancing testability.
- Developed user interfaces using **WinForms**, optimizing user experience with efficient layouts and responsive designs.
- Established continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes using **Git** and **AWS**, reducing deployment times by **80%**.
- Managed real-time communication using **SignalR**, which improved user engagement and interaction with the application.
- Conducted code reviews and implemented **SOLID** principles to ensure high-quality code and adherence to clean coding standards across the team.

Utilized **C#** and **.NET** framework to develop robust back-end services, optimizing performance and improving system response times by **25%**.
Implemented **Entity Framework** for efficient database interactions with **SQL Server**, ensuring high-quality data management and retrieval.
Designed and developed **Web APIs** to facilitate seamless communication within applications, adhering to software development principles and design patterns.
Employed advanced **multithreading** techniques and **async/await** methodology to enhance application responsiveness, contributing to improved user experience.
Executed automated unit testing using **xUnit** and **NUnit**, ensuring code reliability and maintainability while following **SOLID** and Clean Code principles.
Incorporated **Dependency Injection** and **IoC** strategies to promote code reusability and testability, aligning with DDD and CQRS architecture.
Developed interactive user interfaces utilizing **WinForms** as part of the .NET ecosystem, enhancing user engagement and functionality.
Facilitated version control and collaborative development through **Git**, streamlining the development process.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines effectively using **Jenkins** and **Azure**, achieving a consistent and agile release process.
Leveraged real-time communication features with **SignalR**, enhancing user interaction and engagement in the developed applications.

• Developed and implemented robust backend Web APIs using **C#** and **.NET**, adhering to software development principles and design patterns, which enhanced application performance and maintainability.
• Leveraged **Entity Framework** for efficient data access with **SQL Server**, achieving a **99%** efficiency in data retrieval processes.
• Utilized multithreading strategies with **async/await** and **Task Parallel Library** to optimize application responsiveness, managing up to **10,000** concurrent users without performance degradation.
• Applied unit testing frameworks such as **xUnit** and **NUnit**, ensuring code quality and maintaining a **30%** reduction in bugs prior to production deployment.
• Engaged in Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) practices for streamlined updates and maintenance, reducing deployment time by **25%**.
• Enhanced Windows Forms application using **WinForms** and implemented **Dependency Injection**, leading to improved code structure and testability.
• Designed solutions using **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** and **Command Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS)**, promoting clear separation of concerns within application architecture.
• Integrated real-time communication features using **SignalR**, creating responsive user experiences with a response time of under **200ms**.
• Deployed and managed services with **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring high availability and scalability, with a reported uptime of **99.9%**.
